description: This file contains unit tests for the authentication registration and login endpoints of a FastAPI application, including registration, duplicate registration handling, login, and retrieval of user info.

methods.name: _register_and_login(email: str, full_name: str | None = None, password: str = "StrongPassw0rd!")
methods.description: Helper function to register a user, attempt duplicate registration, login, and verify user info.

methods.name: test_register_login_json_provider(monkeypatch, tmp_path)
methods.description: Test case for user registration and login using default JSON provider, with environment variables unset.

methods.name: test_register_login_sqlite_provider(monkeypatch, tmp_path)
methods.description: Test case for user registration and login with SQLite provider, setting environment variables accordingly.

ctags.name: _register_and_login
ctags.pattern: /^def _register_and_login(email: str, full_name: str | None = None, password: str = "StrongPassw0r/
ctags.signature: (email: str, full_name: str | None = None, password: str = "StrongPassw0rd!")
